item.dc:creator: @Cledi Cledi
item.description:
@Cledi wrote:

I’m actually going to host this server with Dragonic in which we already have a VPS, and have lots of creative ideas in which we can put into the server. We also have a forum which is already made.

Later updates about the server will be posted here, and the server will be launched quite soon. (Along with the Website URL)

I was having a little think about the Donator shop last night, and was wondering what the community wanted, as I’ve seen you don’t want a Pay2Win aspect, which I totally agree with and that the XP rates should be quite low to make it an achievement to get a 99.

As for the Donator shop, I was thinking of it holding pointless things such as Party Hats, Santa Hats, Costumes, Masks, and maybe with being able to directly buy a custom whip, such as Ice, Dragon, Cyan, Green etc but directly buying those items from the shop would result in it being non trade-able but there also being a way to get the whips for the player community, so people don’t feel pressured into getting donator. However with that being said, it’s going to be difficult to get one of the whips from a boss which we haven’t thought of yet, maybe adding it to an existing boss or creating an entirely new boss, those not being non trade-able and being slightly better/worse than the abyssal whip. Another idea was that it’s kind of like Supply Drops in Advanced Warfare, so there’s different variants of the whips, and some are really good variants (for example the Ice whip and Dragon whip) those having increased stats in Attack & Strength but maybe suffering in the Defence (say that was the Dragon whip) and as for the Ice whip, it could be different in which it has increased Defence and Attack, but decreased in Strength. And as for the lower types of whips such as Bronze, they could have just an increase in one area, but decreased in two areas, for example being increased in Defence, but being decreased in Strength and Attack. (You get the idea) And of-course the ones with the better stats aren’t dropped as frequently as the lower end whips.

Just a couple ideas thrown into a paragraph there, make sure to reply in what you think!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

popcorn57:

You are pretty much spot on. Gets annoying seeing every server pay2win. When do you think you will have a server up?

Im not saying that we dont want donations, we are not made of gold so we need donations to keep the server running[quote=“Limits, post:9, topic:550839”]How about as a quest reward you can have the ability to use the command ::fly that replaces the run and walk animations with flying ones.[/quote][quote=“runescape sucks, post:7, topic:550839”][quote author=Welliton_inc link=topic=669752.msg4478509#msg4478509 date=1427840854]

quest items shouldn’t be completely worthless. It should be enough incentive to do the quest. your reward should be useful but not game breaking. You don’t necessarily even have to get an item as a reward though, really.

Instead of an item, you could just receive a decent amount of XP. That way it does provide people with a reason to do the quest.
[/quote]
This. Or features, like whenever Jagex releases a quest, usually you don’t just get experience or items, you unlock something new. Like a new area or something, new monsters to kill, new ways to train.[/quote]

I like your ideas thanks for the suggestions.and about the xp rate I decided that it will go to 40

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

asshole_rule:

100x is too high. A quality server should have an xp rate where 99 is an accomplishment. 100x is an easy ass 99.

Definitely agree with this. 99s are achievable on RS3 with less than a month of consistent play, being generous maybe 14 hours a day. 14*30=420 hours, at 100x it would only take 4.2 hours. That’s not an achievement by any means
